instruction: Generate a PowerPoint presentation about the history of the internet.
output:
[PowerPoint Presentation]

The presentation will cover the history of the internet, starting with the ARPANET in the 1960s, and will cover the development of the internet throughout the years, including the development of the World Wide Web in the 1990s, the growth of social media and mobile technology in the 2000s, and the current advances in cloud computing, artificial intelligence, and the internet of things.
